Package Maths

Class MinkowskiKNN

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maths.kNN
      • Maths.MinkowskiKNN
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EuclideanKNN, ManhattanKNN

    public class MinkowskiKNN
extends kNN
    Maths.MinkowskiKNN extends the Maths.kNN abstract method and uses an Minkowski distance metric for the calculations. The formula is [distance] = (sum((endPoint - origin) ^ order)) ^ (1/order) where the sum adds the values for every dimension, and order is the power to use.
    Version:
    Milestone 4
    Author:
    Darren

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinkowskiKNN

        public MinkowskiKNN​(DimensionalSpace ds,
                    int n)
        Constructor for Maths.EuclideanKNN. Takes a DataModel.DimensionalSpace object that it will work in and the order to be used for the calculation. Calls the Maths.kNN constructor.
        Parameters:
        ds - The DataModel.DimensionalSpace the the function will work in.
        n - The order for the Minkowski function.

    • Method Detail

      • findKNN

        public Cell findKNN​(java.lang.String targetKey,
                    Point targetPoint,
                    int neighbours)
        findKNN finds the target value for the given point using a Minkowski KNN algorithm with the k nearest points. Calls the super class's findValue funtion once the nearest neighbours are found.
        Specified by:
        findKNN in class kNN
        Parameters:
        targetKey - The key to be found
        targetPoint - The point whose value is to be found
        neighbours - The number of nearest neighbours to query
        Returns:
        The unknown value of the given point

      • MinkowskiComposite

        public float MinkowskiComposite​(CellComposite current,
                                CellComposite target)
        Iterates through all of the sub cells in a DataModel.CompositeCell and calculates the distance from that DataModel.CompositeCell to the target point's corresponding DataModel.CompositeCell.
        Parameters:
        current - The DataModel.CompositeCell of the non-target point
        target - The DataModel.CompositeCell of the target point
        Returns:
        The distance between the Cells
